author: crossley
msg: Show how to get started with a project sitemap example.

author: jdcasey
msg: Adding sample settings.xml files. One goes in the maven distro, the other is in the maven-settings project dir, for reference. The one in maven-settings is intended to be authoritative.

author: jm
msg: bug 4407: really idle servers were exiting after 5 minutes of inactivity, due to a watchdog timeout.  implement a 'ping' operation, run every 2.5 minutes, to avoid this

author: pquerna
msg: * build/buildcheck.sh: Replace last mentions of CVS with SVN.
